text: Priscilla Morrill (June 4, 1927 â€“ November 9, 1994) was an American actress. She was well known for playing Edie Grant on The Mary Tyler Moore Show. She also played Elaine Hogan on the TV show Family. Morrill was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She died from complications of a kidney infection in Los Angeles at age 67. title: Priscilla Morrill
